Text.Name: Dan_BasePracticeDrug
Text.Desc: Unlock your body's potential, temporarily increasing Perception, Constitution and Intelligence by 30% each.

Text.Name: Modifier_Dan_JingYuan
Text.Desc: By consuming the Stamina Pill, the ability of one's body to generate Stamina is improved within 7 days, increasing Hunger Consumption Rate and Stamina Conversion Rate.

Text.Name: Modifier_Dan_JingYuan2
Text.Desc: By consuming the Ginseng Pill, the ability of one's body to generate Stamina is improved within 14 days, increasing Hunger Consumption Rate and Stamina Conversion Rate.

Text.Name: Modifier_Dan_JingYuan3
Text.Desc: By consuming the Resin Essence Powder, the ability of one's body to generate Stamina is improved within 28 days, increasing Hunger Consumption Rate and Stamina Conversion Rate.

Text.Name: Dan_Ling1
Text.Desc: Increases Qi recovery rate by 2,000%.

Text.Name: Dan_Ling3
Text.Desc: Increases Max Qi by 100,000.

Text.Name: Dan_Defense
Text.Desc: Increases your base Protection strength by 30%.

Text.Name: Dan_FiveBase1
Text.Desc: Increases Perception by 30% for 48 hours.

Text.Name: Dan_FiveBase2
Text.Desc: Increases Constitution by 30% for 48 hours.

Text.Name: Dan_FiveBase3
Text.Desc: Increases Charisma by 30% for 48 hours.

Text.Name: Dan_FiveBase4
Text.Desc: Increases Intelligence by 30% for 48 hours.

Text.Name: Dan_FiveBase5
Text.Desc: Increases Luck by 30% for 48 hours.

Text.Name: Dan_PracticeRate
Text.DisplayName: Increases the chance of successfully breakthroughing.

Text.Name: Dan_CalmDown
Text.Desc: Consumption of the Purity Pill will calm one's Mental State to a certain extent, and reduces the fluctuation of mood within one day.

Text.Name: Dan_Happiness
Text.Desc: Consumption of the Euphoria Pill will immerse one in happiness within two days, but it greatly hinders work efficiency.

Text.Name: Dan_NoHunger
Text.Desc: Consumption of Inedia Pill grants one the ability of Qi Absorption for two days, enabling auto-replenishment of Hunger.

Text.Name: Dan_NoHunger1
Text.Desc: Consumption of the Nourish Pill decreases one's Hunger and Fatigue rates within two days.

Text.Name: Dan_NoHunger2
Text.Desc: Consumption of Fasting Pill will significantly decrease the speed at which one consumes food and water.

Text.Name: Dan_NoHunger3
Text.Desc: Consumption of Qi Fasting Pill will significantly decrease the speed at which one consumes food and water.

Text.Name: Dan_LostSoul
Text.Desc: Very basic mineral-based pill. Consuming this pill will cause one's brain function to be repressed and fell into a coma for 3 whole days.

Text.Name: Modifier_Item_Anodyne
Text.Desc: Relieve pain. Its effect will last around 5 days.

Text.Name: Modifier_Item_Ginseng
Text.Desc: Improves natural resilience for a short period of time.

Text.Name: Modifier_Item_RedGinseng
Text.Desc: Significantly improves natural resilience for a short period of time.

Text.Name: Modifier_Item_RedGinseng1
Text.Desc: Increases Max Qi.

Text.Name: Modifier_Item_Laxative1
Text.Desc: After taking the Laxative Pill, one would be considerably weakened and has a very low work efficiency.

Text.Name: Modifier_Item_LongXianGuo
Text.Desc: By consuming the Amber Fruit, one becomes immune to hunger and fatigue within half a day.

Text.Name: Modifier_Item_LingWater
Text.Desc: Consumption of Spirit Dew will greatly improve one's recovery rate from wound for a short period of time.

Text.Name: Dan_LingStone
Text.Desc: Use spirit stone in cultivation to resonate with Qi energies, greatly increasing one's Qi Recovery Rate and Cultivation Speed.

Text.Name: Dan_LingCrystal
Text.Desc: Use Spirit Crystal in cultivation to deeply resonate with Qi energies, greatly increasing one's Qi Recovery Rate and Cultivation Speed.

Text.Name: Dan_Fail1
Text.Desc: After taking that strange elixir pill, my body was suddenly shrunk.

Text.Name: Dan_Fail2
Text.Desc: After taking that strange elixir pill, my body was suddenly enlarged.

Text.Name: Dan_Soul4
Text.Desc: Consume part of your lifespan to gain superb intelligence for 2 hours, but it will leave permanent damage to intelligence afterwards.

Text.Name: Dan_LunHui1
Text.Desc: Touched by this section of memory from a different world.

Text.Name: Modifier_Item_XieHunLu
Text.Desc: By consuming the Evil Nectar, one's Intelligence and learning ability are increased.

Text.Name: Modifier_Item_ZaoHuaYuLu
Text.Desc: By consuming the Fortune Nectar, one's Primordial Spirit enters a state of oblivion.

Text.Name: Modifier_Item_Boss_Meat
Text.Desc: Greatly increases Max Qi and Lifespan.

Text.Name: Modifier_Item_BossZhuLong_Meat
Text.Desc: Decreases Attainment and increases Lifespan.

Text.Name: Modifier_Item_Dan_FabaoNumAdd
Text.Desc: Increases maximum number of Artifacts by 1.

Text.Name: Modifier_Dan_TiShen
Text.Desc: Allows you to escape from an Auction.
